MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G45 area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:48am. Our engineers have arrived onsite at the Glenacre Drive substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:13am on Saturday, 06 February 2021
